tool_description:
Introducing Google Bard API, your gateway to the world of Bard, a powerful language model driven by the PaLM Model. This API offers seamless programmable access to Bard's capabilities.

Key Features:

1. Advanced Language Generation: Harness the cutting-edge PaLM Model for enhanced language generation.
2. Current Knowledge: Access a model trained with data up to 2023, ensuring relevance and accuracy.
3. Integrated Web Search: Easily perform web searches directly through the API.
4. Website So...
name: Google Bard
title: Google Bard

api_list.name: ask

required_parameters.default: best place to ear near me
